Commentary: complete mix-up at third man after a top-edge from Soumya. Sundar, running in from the boundary, doesn't seem to have called. Neither has Pandey running back from point. In the end, neither sticks the hands out and it lands between them. An ugly shot from the batsman, trying to hoick this over midwicket as it straightened outside off

Commentary: short and very wide. Reaches out and slaps this through extra cover on the up. Some turn first up, but this would've been a wide if he had left

Commentary: arm ball, length and just outside off. Opens the face and chops to third man with no feet

Commentary: beaten on the outside edge. He draws him in with a loopy length ball outside off and turns it away

Commentary: floated up at off stump, driven back to the bowler
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: length and straight through outside off, cut to point
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Soumya Sarkar, no run

Commentary: pushes in a quicker one, good length and headed for off stump. Sarkar just manages to get bat as he goes deep in the crease. Turns it to fine leg

Commentary: short-arm whip to deep square on the up. Nice looking shot, picked up from outside off

Commentary: clears the long leg boundary. Overpitched ball angled into the pads and he uses the angle to lift it over the line

Commentary: clears mid-off with a stylish shot. Length on off stump and he steps out to try and punch it straight over the bowler. Ends up getting too much elevation

Commentary: short ball climbs up too far outside off. Left alone
Commentary_short: Unadkat to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

Commentary: taken at short fine. Chahal lunges forward and to his right to take a sharp one. Sarkar looks to use the angle on the whip again, but this time it's shorter than before and gets big on him. Guides it straight to the fielder

Commentary: short of a length on middle stump. Nudged to short fine with a closed face

Commentary: length on middle stump, quickly forward before turning this past midwicket

Commentary: tossed up on off stump, tapped back to the bowler on the front foot

Commentary: flat and full on off stump. Hurriedly flicked to square leg

Commentary: dropped a touch short outside off. Cut straight to point
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: length on leg stump, clipped through square leg from the crease
Commentary_short: Washington Sundar to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

Commentary: shot. Superbly placed. Fine leg and square leg are in so he plonks the front leg across to the off side and picks this length ball up from there. Gets four with a ramp over that region

Commentary: short of a length just outside off, steered straight to point with the angle

Commentary: full and pushed wide outside off. Steps out and looks to go through cover again. Beaten

Commentary: Tamim has reviewed the lbw decision against him. He's struck in front of the stumps as he looks to flick. He's shuffled a long way. Says no bat when his partner asks and goes for the review. Looks out on all counts and this will be about where the ball pitched...and it's outside leg. He survives. A close call and the umpire took a long long time to make the decision. Tamim makes the correct decision in the end
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, no run

Commentary: crunched wide of mid-off. Tamim stays put after all the moving around. This is length and angled across him. All hands as he punches it
Commentary_short: Thakur to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

Commentary: steps out, gets cramped, swipes from under it with a swivel and clears mid-off. Not a convincing shot against this bouncer. In the end, it looks rather like a middle-school classroom fan dispatching an eraser thrown at it

Commentary: another one at short fine leg. Tamim won't get away with the swipe against the short ball this time. It's too quick for him and is shaping away from his back shoulder. He slices a simple one for the fielder

Dismissal_text: Tamim Iqbal c Unadkat b Thakur 15 (16b 2x4 0x6) SR: 93.75

Commentary: tossed up at a length and spinning away from off stump. Watchfully pushed into the off side

Commentary: length on middle stump. Opens up his stance and looks to cream this through cover. He isn't to the pitch and it rolls back feebly down the pitch

Commentary: nicely done. Quickly switches to a left-hander's stance without altering the grip, picks up the full ball from middle stump and smacks it over point with the reverse-sweep

Commentary: swatted away. Length on middle stump, reaches out and swings fiercely to send this to the midwicket boundary

Commentary: leading edge clears midwicket. Length ball dug in and headed down leg side. He looks to flick and closes the face too soon

Commentary: short of a length at leg stump, nudged into the square leg region

Commentary: dropped at fine leg. Sundar this time. Shankar catches Liton with yet another bouncer and he slices awkwardly once more. Sundar runs in as it dips on him and has made his ground, but can't hold on after lunging low

Commentary: short of a length on middle stump, defended off the back foot

Commentary: slow, loopy length ball on leg stump. Tapped back down the pitch aerially

Commentary: tossed up at off stump, driven back at the bowler, uppishly again.

Commentary: full on off stump, drives with hard hands after a skip down the track. Uppishly through cover

Commentary: Liton survives a run-out attempt. Rahim gets only pad on this length ball and it rolls into the leg side. Liton takes the run easy but Karthik is onto it quickly and unleashes a throw on the turn. Can't hit

Commentary: 73kph, floated up on a good length. Sweeps across the line and gets an under-edge into the square leg region

Commentary: backs away and slaps it wide of mid-off. Short of a length from Shankar at an off stump line. Plenty of room that he's created for himself before forcing this off the low part of the bat

Commentary: this hook shot thing isn't working for him. Steps out and swings, misses the short ball by quite a way

Commentary: back of a length in the corridor, guided to third man with an open face

Commentary: clears midwicket with the pull. Dropped short, he gets the front leg out of the way and is quickly under this to nail the pull

Commentary: India have reviewed a caught-behind decision that they're extremely confident about. Short of a length ball wide outside off. he steps out and makes too much room in his attempt to clear extra cover. Karthik and Shankar celebrated as soon as the former took it. The umpire was unmoved....Ultra Edge shows a spike and Rahim is already outside the ground before the umpire has amended the decision. First international wicket for Shankar

Dismissal_text: Mushfiqur Rahim c †Karthik b Shankar 18 (14b 2x4 1x6) SR: 128.57

Commentary: inside edge on the cut, stopped acrobatically by Karthik to his left. Short and wide from Shankar

Commentary: dropped at leg gully! Superb effort to his left from Mehidy. Tentative flick from Raina, rooted to the crease against the inswinger. It's zooming to his left and he can't hang on after the dive. He's really close in
